item.title: 国防科技独角兽 Shield AI 任命前 Splunk 首席执行官为新首席执行官
item.description:
加里-斯蒂尔将领导这家市值 53 亿美元的无人机初创公司。【原文：

Gary Steele will lead the $5.3 billion drone startup. 

】

item.title: 墨西哥暂缓关税报复，辛鲍姆押注美国交易
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）正在推迟对美国进口钢铁和铝关税的回应，以避免报复，同时两国正在进行谈判，以避免对多种产品和服务征税。【原文：Mexico is delaying its response to US tariffs on steel and aluminum imports as President Claudia Sheinbaum avoids retaliation while both countries negotiate to avert levies on a wide range of products and services.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会因资源限制寻求推迟亚马逊 Prime 案件的审理
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会正以该机构资源 "严重 "紧张为由，请求联邦法官推迟对亚马逊公司 Prime 订阅做法提出质疑的审判。【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission is asking a federal judge to delay a trial challenging Amazon.com Inc.’s Prime subscription practices, citing “severe” resource constraints at the agency.】

item.title: 据说 ADM 考虑出售期货清算部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司正在探索出售其期货经纪部门，因为该公司正在权衡剥离资产以削减成本。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. is exploring a sale of its futures brokerage arm, as the company weighs divestitures to slash costs, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对冲基金的避风港吸引力在特朗普贸易战中受到考验
item.description: 在市场大跌迫使对冲基金急速平仓拥挤交易的情况下，多策略对冲基金正面临着自大流行病初期以来最大的挑战。【原文：Multistrategy hedge funds are facing their biggest challenge since the early days of the pandemic amid a market selloff that’s forcing them to unwind crowded trades at a ferocious clip.】

item.title: 拉特克利夫的英力士公司因车门飞开召回 7,000 多辆 SUV
item.description: 亿万富翁吉姆-拉特克利夫（Jim Ratcliffe）在其亏损的汽车业务上遭遇了新的挫折，他在美国召回了 7000 多辆汽车，因为客户反映他们的越野车在行驶过程中车门飞开。【原文：Billionaire Jim Ratcliffe suffered a fresh setback at his money-losing auto business, recalling more than 7,000 vehicles in the US after customers reported that doors on their SUVs flew open while driving.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税威胁和行动一览表
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普自1月20日开始其第二个任期以来，已下令对贸易公平性进行了多项调查，口头发出了数次关税威胁，并征收了一些进口税。一些国家对美国商品实施了关税报复。【原文：President Donald Trump has ordered a number of investigations into trade fairness, issued several tariff threats verbally and imposed some import taxes since his second term started Jan. 20. A few countries have retaliated against American goods with tariffs of their own.】

item.title: 据说花粉街正在权衡讨债人对的选择
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，Pollen Street 集团正在探索 Pair Finance GmbH 的各种选择，包括可能出售这家德国数字债务催收公司。【原文：Pollen Street Group is exploring options for Pair Finance GmbH, including a potential sale of the German digital debt collector, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 圭亚那在建立石油财富后寻求苏里南天然气交易
item.description: 圭亚那总统伊尔法安-阿里（Irfaan Ali）正在探索与苏里南合作建设天然气工业中心的可能性，因为他正致力于巩固圭亚那在过去十年中因石油而迅速转型的经济。【原文：Guyana President Irfaan Ali is exploring a partnership with Suriname to build a gas-powered industrial hub as he works to fortify his nation’s economy, which was rapidly transformed by oil fortunes in the past decade.】

item.title: 圭亚那在建立石油财富后寻求苏里南天然气交易
item.description: 圭亚那总统伊尔法安-阿里（Irfaan Ali）正在探索与苏里南合作建设天然气工业中心的可能性，因为他正致力于巩固圭亚那在过去十年中因石油而迅速转型的经济。【原文：Guyana President Irfaan Ali is exploring a partnership with Suriname to build a gas-powered industrial hub as he works to fortify his nation’s economy, which was rapidly transformed by oil fortunes in the past decade.】

item.title: 荷兰银行部门因向金融流言者支付费用以吸引客户而被罚款
item.description: 荷兰银行（ABN Amro Bank NV）旗下的在线经纪商 Bux BV 因向金融影响者、比较网站和现有客户支付费用以推荐潜在新客户而被罚款 160 万欧元（170 万美元）。【原文：ABN Amro Bank NV-owned online broker Bux BV was fined €1.6 million ($1.7 million) for paying finfluencers, comparison websites and existing customers a fee to refer potential new clients.】

item.title: 南非提出加强借贷控制的方案
item.description: 在一个偿债成本占税收五分之一的国家，南非加紧了关于通过一项具有约束力的规则来控制政府借贷的辩论。【原文：South Africa stepped up its debate about adopting a binding rule to control government borrowing in a nation where debt-service costs consume a fifth of tax revenue.】

item.title: 地图显示，美国西岸城市更容易获得信贷
item.description:
纽约联邦储备银行（Federal Reserve Bank of New York）的一项新研究细分了信贷安全的地理分布，这是衡量社区金融健康状况的一个鲜为人知的指标。【原文：

A new study by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York breaks down the geography of credit security — a little-explored metric of a community’s financial health. 

】

item.title: 尽管有已知的修复措施，但网络攻击仍使 X 等网站不断下线
item.description: 尽管有已知的修复措施，但网络攻击仍使 X 等网站不断下线【原文：Cyberattacks Keep Knocking Websites Like X Offline, Despite Known Fixes】

item.title: S&P 回吐涨幅，投资者怀疑反弹能否持久
item.description: 周三上午股市的快速爆发同样迅速消退，在不到两个小时的时间里，300 多只 S&P 500 指数股票走低，这意味着寻求市场底部的投资者或许应该继续寻找。【原文：The stock market’s quick burst out of the gate Wednesday morning faded just as fast, sending more than 300 S&P 500 Index stocks lower in less than two hours, meaning investors seeking a bottom in the market probably should keep looking.】

item.title: 卡森-布洛克称特斯拉暴跌并不意味着它是做空目标
item.description: 卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）说，即使在特斯拉公司股价经历了四年多来最严重的单日下跌之后，他仍然不会与埃隆-马斯克对赌。【原文：Carson Block says he still wouldn’t bet against Elon Musk, even after Tesla Inc. shares experienced their worst one-day drop in more than four years.】

item.title: 贸易争端压倒温和的价格数据，股市抹去涨幅
item.description: 周三，由于投资者对特朗普政府不断扩大的贸易冲突所带来的影响越来越焦虑，美国股市早盘的反弹势头逐渐减弱。【原文：An early rebound in US stocks faded Wednesday, as investors grew antsy about the impact from the Trump administration’s widening trade conflict.】

item.title: TCW 和 Threadneedle 看重复杂抵押贷款债券而非 CLO
item.description: 购买由美国企业贷款支持的复杂债券的基金经理们越来越发现，他们不仅要关注企业的表现，还要关注美国住宅抵押贷款市场的表现。【原文：Money managers that buy sophisticated bonds backed by US corporate loans are increasingly finding they have to not just pay attention to how companies are performing, but also how the US residential mortgage debt market is doing.】

item.title: 摩根大通重用博雅银行的杰伊-哈里斯（Jay Harris）出任中型企业并购部主管
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）从美国银行（Bank of America Corp）聘请了兼并与收购银行家杰伊-哈里斯（Jay Harris），作为华尔街最大的贷款机构，摩根大通致力于更全面地覆盖中小型公司。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. hired mergers-and-acquisitions banker Jay Harris from Bank of America Corp. as Wall Street’s largest lender pushes to more thoroughly cover smaller and midsize companies.】

item.title: 谷歌首次推出机器人人工智能模型，挑战 Meta、OpenAI
item.description: Alphabet 公司的人工智能实验室首次推出了两款专注于机器人技术的新模型，它们将帮助开发人员训练机器人对陌生场景做出反应。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s artificial intelligence lab is debuting two new models focused on robotics, which will help developers train robots to respond to unfamiliar scenarios — a longstanding challenge in the field.】

item.title: 大选后埃隆-马斯克的私人公司在二级市场飙升
item.description: 过去几个月里，埃隆-马斯克的上市公司特斯拉公司的股价一直处于自由落体状态。但他的私人公司的股票却并非如此。【原文：Shares of Tesla Inc., Elon Musk’s public company, have been in freefall for the last few months. But shares in his private companies aren’t.】

item.title: 2 月份鸡蛋价格飙升，但有缓解迹象
item.description: 由于禽流感导致鸡蛋短缺，在 2 月份备受关注的通胀报告中，美国鸡蛋价格再次飙升，但有迹象表明，需求下降正在带来一些缓解。【原文：US egg prices once again surged in February’s closely watched inflation report amid a shortage caused by bird flu, but there are signs that dropping demand is bringing some relief.】

item.title: Binance 称阿布扎比 MGX 投资 20 亿美元
item.description: Binance 表示，阿布扎比的 MGX 以 20 亿美元收购了少数股权，这是全球最大加密货币交易所获得的第一笔机构投资。【原文：Binance said Abu Dhabi’s MGX has acquired a minority stake for $2 billion, the first institutional investment in the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange.】

item.title: 瑞银出售部分瑞信中国股权获批
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）表示，已获得监管部门批准出售瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）中国合资公司 36% 的股份，从而使两家银行在世界第二大经济体的全面整合更加接近。【原文：UBS Group AG said it received regulatory approval to sell a 36% stake in Credit Suisse’s China venture, bringing closer the full integration of the two banks in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 雪佛龙着眼于墨西哥和中东地区以替代委内瑞拉原油
item.description: 在特朗普政府下令雪佛龙公司关闭在南美国家的业务后，雪佛龙公司正寻求用墨西哥、巴西和中东的石油替代其炼油厂的委内瑞拉石油。【原文：Chevron Corp. is looking to replace Venezuelan oil at its refineries with supplies from Mexico, Brazil and the Middle East after the Trump administration ordered the company to shut operations in the South American country.】

item.title: 瑞银为 Celsius 的 Alani Nu 收购项目提供 10 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，以瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）为首的一批银行周三为能量饮料制造商 Celsius Holdings Inc.【原文：A group of banks led by UBS Group AG launched a $1 billion debt package on Wednesday for energy-drink maker Celsius Holdings Inc.’s acquisition of Alani Nutrition LLC, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 经济前景改善，波兰保持利率稳定
item.description: 波兰央行再次维持利率不变，原因是经济前景不断改善，通胀风险持续存在。【原文：Poland’s central bank left interest rates unchanged again on the back of improving economic prospects and continued inflation risks.】

item.title: 南非国民银行行长敦促南非尽快达成预算协议以提高确定性
item.description: 奈德银行集团有限公司（Nedbank Group Ltd. ）董事长丹尼尔-姆米内莱（Daniel Mminele）说，南非预算案缺乏共识已使企业陷入 "混乱"。主席丹尼尔-姆米内莱（Daniel Mminele）说，他敦促立法者修补分歧，以确保政策的确定性。【原文：The lack of consensus on South Africa’s budget has thrown businesses into “disarray,” Nedbank Group Ltd. Chairman Daniel Mminele said, urging lawmakers to patch up differences to ensure policy certainty.】

item.title: 顶级石油交易商看空油价，认为全球供应过剩
item.description: 休斯顿一年一度的大型石油天然气聚会上，人们对化石燃料友好型特朗普政府领导下的石油天然气行业前景持乐观态度。但有一个重要的问题：一些最大的石油交易商对原油价格的前景越来越看跌。【原文：The mood at Houston’s big annual oil and gas get-together has been upbeat on the prospects for the industry under a fossil fuel-friendly Trump administration. But there’s a significant catch: some of the biggest oil traders are getting more bearish on the outlook for crude prices.】
